ComicInfo.Summary:
When a family heading on a weekend vacation comes across a violent gang during an initiation ritual, things go from bad to bloody as this trip takes a turn in the wrong direction. This story will make you think twice about flashing your headlights!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Eric J & Mohan Sivakami | 1 | B | Cover B | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Derlis Santacruz & Sanju Nivangune | 3 | D | Black Friday Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | E | VIP Black Friday Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 200 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | F | Black Friday Incentive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | G | Black Friday Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 25 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | H | Holiday Zenbox Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 150 | Keith Garvey | Missing |
